meanings.sent1: The puzzle was finally done after hours of work.
meanings.sent2: The project was done on time and within budget.
meanings.sent3: I felt so proud when I saw my perfectly done homework.
meanings.sent4: Her painting was so well done, it looked like a photograph.
meanings.sent5: The sunset painted the sky with colors as if it was done by a master artist.

meanings.sent1: The steak was perfectly done, just the way I like it.
meanings.sent2: The cookies were done baking and smelled delicious.
meanings.sent3: The chef proudly presented his well-done steak to the customers.
meanings.sent4: The vegetables were done to perfection, not too soft or too hard.
meanings.sent5: The cake was beautifully done, with a golden crust and moist interior.

meanings.sent1: After the long hike, I was completely done and ready for a nap.
meanings.sent2: The marathon left me feeling done, but accomplished.
meanings.sent3: I collapsed on the couch, done from a day of cleaning.
meanings.sent4: The old car was done, barely able to run anymore.
meanings.sent5: The tired puppy flopped down, done from playing all day.
